title: Strengthening E-Learning Practical Competencies: Virtual Peer Mentoring for Enhancing STEM Female Mentors' Capabilities

context.prior_knowledge: Comprehension of core concepts and intermediate-level application skills
context.additional_context: Competency enhancement program for professionals in education/teaching/learning fields

learning_goals: Learners can improve mentees' self-efficacy in STEM fields by over 20% by applying effective communication strategies in a virtual mentoring platform.
Learners can achieve over 80% proficiency in forming and maintaining mentor-mentee relationships through PBL-based task performance.
Learners can systematically manage mentoring activity records and provide feedback using digital collaboration tools.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
